hero.title: Frequently Asked Questions
hero.subtitle: Everything you need to know about My Private Tutor Online
hero.description: Find detailed answers to the most commonly asked questions about our tutors, process, pricing, and more.

questions.question: What is My Private Tutor Online?
questions.answer: My Private Tutor Online is a boutique, specialist tutoring company founded in 2010 by Bristol-educated, Cambridge-accepted educator and ex-Forbes journalist Elizabeth Burrows. We deliver premium one-to-one tuition for students from KS1 to A-Level and IB. Our carefully selected tutors include Oxbridge graduates, experienced teachers, and official examiners.

questions.question: Why do parents choose My Private Tutor Online?
questions.answer: Personalised Experience: Our model is highly curated. Elizabeth personally guides the tutor selection process. Expert Examiners: Our Tier 1 tutors are official examiners who write and mark real assessments. Outstanding Results: 94% of GCSE students improve by two or more grades, many jumping from grade 5 to grade 8/9 in months.

questions.question: Do you offer in-person tutoring?
questions.answer: Our focus is online tutoring to maximise quality and match. However, we do have a select group of trusted educators who offer in-person sessions in London. Please contact our team to enquire about availability.

questions.question: How do the tutor tiers work?
questions.answer: Tier 1: Official examiners ideal for high-achieving students. Tier 2: Qualified teachers with 5+ years experience. Tier 3: Graduate subject specialists for mentoring and confidence building. Specialist tutoring begins at just ¬£47.50 per hour with no registration fees.

questions.question: What if I don't like my tutor?
questions.answer: No problem. We'll quickly match you with another educator until we find the ideal fit.

questions.question: What subjects do you offer tutoring in?
questions.answer: We cover entrance exams (4+, 7+, 11+, 13+, 16+), core subjects (English, Maths, Sciences), languages, humanities, sciences, social sciences, arts, university preparation, specialist tests, English language exams, and SEN support.

questions.question: Do you offer university admissions support?
questions.answer: Yes. Our support includes personal statement coaching, interview preparation, subject-specific entrance tests, and Oxbridge strategy masterclasses.

questions.question: What are your success rates?
questions.answer: 94% of GCSE students improve by at least two grades. Many progress from grade 5 to 8/9 within months. We have consistent placements at Oxbridge and other top-tier universities.

questions.question: How much does tutoring cost?
questions.answer: Specialist tutoring begins at just ¬£47.50 per hour. Unlike many providers, we don't charge registration or administrative fees. For a bespoke quote, please complete our enquiry form.

questions.question: Do you offer discounts?
questions.answer: Yes, discounts are available for block bookings (15+ lessons/month) and sibling enrolment.

contact.title: Still Have Questions?
contact.description: Our team is always happy to help. Get in touch to discuss your specific needs or schedule a consultation with Elizabeth.
